display_name.description:
User friendly name which could be used in UI for displaying
namespace name.

namespace.description: The ``namespace`` is unique across all users.

visibility.description:
Namespace visibility. A valid value is ``public`` or ``private`` .
Default is ``private`` .

protected.description:
Namespace protection for deletion. A valid value is ``True`` or
``False`` . Default is ``False`` .

resource_type_associations.description: Resource type(s) which are associated with this namespace.
